about-us.subtitle: Welcome To Technomak!
about-us.title: About Us
about-us.desc-1: We have been established in Azerbaijan as Technomak LLC related to the rental of construction machinery and construction works in order to bring the years of experience to our country and provide a benefit to our country.
about-us.desc-2: As Technomak LLC, which has been continuing its continuity in the best way for many years, has brought its achievements to the present day with great dedication without compromising its vision and missions.
about-us.mission-desc: As Technomak LLC, we offer quality designs at affordable prices, keep their satisfaction at the highest level by producing the most suitable solutions for the expectations of our customers, complete the project deliveries under our commitment on time and in accordance with the standards, evaluate suppliers within the whole quality system and aim to continuously improve together, follow and implement technological developments, make the issue of occupational safety of the first order and improve, use environmentally friendly building materials to the extent possible, it is our mission to apply and be respectful to the environment.
about-us.vision-desc: By providing customers and employees with added value, reaching a wide audience with quality products and services, realizing their social responsibility, loyalty to their values, reliability, quality management, leadership in the range of products and services, specialized staff and customer-oriented understanding of service, to be the first institution that comes to mind and is preferred. Combining our heritage, knowledge and experience gained in the past with strong cooperation, qualified human resources and innovative approaches. To be one of the companies creating reliable buildings and developing high-quality residential premises in Azerbaijan. Effectively support continuous improvement activities to respond quickly to changing customer expectations. Always keep a close eye on industry technologies in order to provide quality services.
about-us.values-desc: Our specific corporate values are at the heart of every activity we carry out. In the projects we undertake, we know that these values cannot be decommunized, and we work accordingly. When we work according to our values, we know that we will achieve greater success in the sector we provide.
about-us.policy-desc-1: A disciplined and up-to-date approach to requirements in the fastest and most efficient way based on customer needs,
about-us.policy-desc-2: The principle of providing quality services that are planned and whose standards are at the highest level,
about-us.policy-desc-3: Timely completion and execution of projects according to the work schedule and technical specifications, as well as the use of modern and modern methods, technologies, information and management systems required by the era,
about-us.policy-desc-4: Creating a peaceful working environment by developing mutual trust, respect, understanding, love, decommunization, and communication between employees,
about-us.policy-desc-5: To carry out continuous improvement, ensuring the continuity of the quality assurance system,
about-us.policy-desc-6: To implement a culture of prevention by systematically analyzing the risks associated with potentially dangerous situations and behaviors throughout our activities.
